Author: cowgirI
Text: trust they do bloat. food doesn’t disappear once it lands in your stomach & considering how much they supposedly eat there’s just no way they wouldn’t bloat. they’re probably just not broadcasting their food babies which is fair. however i also have suspicions that they aren’t entirely honest with what they’re eating

Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: Why not all of the above? But yeah I agree with what you are saying. There are few people who will naturally sit at a BMI 18.5 when recovered.   Though I can understand that when restoring weight you may need a huge amount of food to gain.
